job.title: Entry Level Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Responsibilities</p><ul><li>Substantial day-to-day coding, performing profiling, optimizing, and general troubleshooting.</li><li>Engage in technical planning, design, and code reviews.</li><li>Participate with other engineers to help plan the company’s long-term engineering roadmap and help identify improvement areas.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Qualifications</p><ul><li>A bachelor's degree or higher in computer science, electrical engineering, or related field.</li><li>Fluency in one or more general purposes programming languages including but not limited to: Java, C/C++, C#, Python, Objective-C.</li><li>3+ years of programming experience.</li><li>Strong passion for programming.</li><li>Solid and creative problem-solving skills.</li><li>Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.</li><li>Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Benefits:&nbsp;</p><p>Dental insurance, flexible schedule, health insurance, paid time off, referral program, vision insurance, life insurance</p><p><br></p><p>Job location:</p><p>3120 139th Avenue Southeast</p><p>Suite 500</p><p>Bellevue, WA 98005</p><p><br></p>
